EXT_SOURCE_1: Normalized score from external data source
EXT_SOURCE_2: Normalized score from external data source
EXT_SOURCE_3: Normalized score from external data source
DAYS_BIRTH: Client's age in days at the time of application
AMT_CREDIT: Final credit amount on the previous application. This differs from AMT_APPLICATION in a way that the AMT_APPLICATION is the amount for which the client initially applied for, but during our approval process he could have received different amount - AMT_CREDIT
DAYS_EMPLOYED: How many days before the application the person started current employment
AMT_GOODS_PRICE: Goods price of good that client asked for (if applicable) on the previous application
DAYS_ID_PUBLISH: How many days before the application did client change the identity document with which he applied for the loan
BUREAU_MAX_DAYS_CREDIT: Maximum of how many days before current application did client apply for Credit Bureau credit
BUREAU_MAX_DAYS_CREDIT_ENDDATE: Maxiumum of Remaining duration of CB credit (in days) at the time of application in Home Credit
BUREAU_MAX_DAYS_ENDDATE_FACT: Maxium of Days since CB credit ended at the time of application in Home Credit (only for closed credit)
PREV_SUM_MIN_AMT_PAYMENT: Minimum of what the client actually paid on previous credit on this installment
PREV_MEAN_MIN_AMT_PAYMENT: Mean of What the client actually paid on previous credit on this installment
